sqlMap.select: SELECT cntr_tpsz_cd, iso_cntr_cd, descr, cntr_grp_cd FROM tb_cntr_tpsz WHERE use_flg = 'Y' AND delt_flg = 'N' ORDER BY cntr_tpsz_cd ASC
SELECT cntr_tpsz_cd, cstms_cntr_cd, descr FROM tb_cntr_tpsz WHERE use_flg = 'Y' AND delt_flg = 'N' ORDER BY cntr_tpsz_cd ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_cntr_tpsz WHERE use_flg = 'Y' AND delt_flg = 'N'

/** MdmCodeContainerSQL.xm > selectCONTAINERCODE_LIST **/ SELECT TOP $topCnt$ CNTR_TPSZ_CD ,CNTR_GRP_CD ,TEU ,ISO_CNTR_CD ,AMS_CNTR_CD ,CSTMS_CNTR_CD ,N1ST_RSV_CNTR_CD ,N2ST_RSV_CNTR_CD ,DESCR ,USE_FLG ,RGST_USRID ,RGST_OFC_CD ,RGST_TMS ,MODI_USRID ,MODI_OFC_CD ,MODI_TMS ,(CASE DELT_FLG WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN 'N' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) AS DELT_FLG ,'Y' AS DB_VALUE FROM TB_CNTR_TPSZ ORDER BY CNTR_TPSZ_CD ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_cntr_tpsz WHERE use_flg = 'Y'
sqlMap.update: /** MdmCodeContainerSQL.xm > updateMDM_MCM_0080 **/ UPDATE tb_cntr_tpsz SET iso_cntr_cd = #iso_cntr_cd# ,cntr_grp_cd = #cntr_grp_cd# ,teu = #teu# ,ams_cntr_cd = #ams_cntr_cd# ,cstms_cntr_cd = #cstms_cntr_cd# ,n1st_rsv_cntr_cd = #n1st_rsv_cntr_cd# ,n2st_rsv_cntr_cd = #n2st_rsv_cntr_cd# ,descr = #descr# ,modi_usrid = #modi_usrid# ,modi_ofc_cd = #modi_ofc_cd# ,modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() ,use_flg = #use_flg# WHERE cntr_tpsz_cd = #cntr_tpsz_cd#
sqlMap.insert: /** MdmCodeContainerSQL.xm > insertMDM_MCM_0080 **/ INSERT INTO tb_cntr_tpsz ( cntr_tpsz_cd , cntr_grp_cd , teu , iso_cntr_cd , ams_cntr_cd , cstms_cntr_cd , n1st_rsv_cntr_cd , n2st_rsv_cntr_cd , descr , use_flg , rgst_usrid , rgst_ofc_cd , rgst_tms , modi_usrid , modi_ofc_cd , modi_tms , delt_flg ) VALUES ( #cntr_tpsz_cd# , #cntr_grp_cd# , (case when #teu# = '' then 0 else isnull(#teu#,0) end) , #iso_cntr_cd# , #ams_cntr_cd# , #cstms_cntr_cd# , #n1st_rsv_cntr_cd# , #n2st_rsv_cntr_cd# , #descr# , 'Y' , #rgst_usrid# , #rgst_ofc_cd# , getdate() , #modi_usrid# , #modi_ofc_cd# , GETUTCDATE() , 'N' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT cntr_tpsz_cd FROM tb_cntr_tpsz WHERE cntr_tpsz_cd = #s_cntr_tpsz_cd#
